section.title: Use Identity Service API v3 instead of API v2.0
section.para: Use the following parameters in combination on any keystone command to specify which version of the API to use:

listitem.para: --os-endpoint. The endpoint to use instead of the one in the service catalog. Defaults to env[OS_SERVICE_ENDPOINT].
The keystone client detects the version of the API from this parameter.
--os-auth_url. The Identity Service endpoint to use for authentication. Defaults to env[OS_AUTH_URL].
--os-identity-api-version. The Identity Service API version. Defaults to env[OS_IDENTITY_API_VERSION] or 2.0.
